field.name: 资产分类
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '9200009561114' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 使用部门
field.d_query_list_sql: select t.id id, t.organization_name NAME from t_pdc_organization t WHERE t.ID =? and t.DELETE_FLAG = 0

field.name: 资产状态
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '9200009561123' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 资产来源
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '9200009561133' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 资产类型
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '9200009561139' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 供应商
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.NAME NAME FROM T_SCMM_SHOP t where t.delete_flag='0' and t.id=?

field.name: 是否重点设备
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '1110871' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 是否计量设备
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '1110871' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 是否主设备
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '1110871' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 使用实验室
field.d_query_list_sql: SELECT t.id, t.item_name NAME FROM t_ctl_dictionary t WHERE parent_id = '9200009605241' AND t.delete_flag = '0'

field.name: 资金来源（资本金，成本金）
